dublin_core.dcvalue: Subjects with moderate head injury are a particular challenge for the emergency physician They represent a heterogeneous population of subjects with large variability in injury severity clinical course and outcome We aimed to determine the early predictors of outcome of subjects with moderate head injury admitted to an Emergency Department ED of a general hospital linked via telemedicine to the Regional Neurosurgical Centre
Journal of neurology, neurosurgery, and psychiatry
Early predictors of unfavourable outcome in subjects with moderate head injury in the emergency department.
